questions.question: What is Lokalhost.io?
questions.answer: Lokalhost.io is a platform providing developers and startups with ready-to-use templates, components, UI kits, and design resources.

questions.question: How do I create an account?
questions.answer: You can sign up using your email or social login options available on the registration page.

questions.question: Are the templates free to use?
questions.answer: We provide a mix of free and premium templates. Free templates can be used directly in your projects.

questions.question: Can I customize the templates?
questions.answer: Yes, all templates come with full customization support to match your project needs.

questions.question: What are the components offered?
questions.answer: We provide functional and production-ready components like buttons, forms, dashboards, headers, and more.

questions.question: Are UI kits compatible with React?
questions.answer: Yes, all our UI kits are designed for React, Next.js, and modern frontend stacks.

questions.question: How do I install components?
questions.answer: You can install components via our CLI or copy-paste them directly into your project.

questions.question: Can I use components in commercial projects?
questions.answer: Yes, you have full ownership and can use the components in commercial and personal projects.

questions.question: Do templates include full projects?
questions.answer: Yes, most templates come as full project setups including frontend, backend boilerplate, or just frontend depending on the template type.

questions.question: Can I get source files?
questions.answer: All templates include code files and design files like Figma, ready for customization.

questions.question: Are templates mobile-friendly?
questions.answer: Yes, all templates are responsive and optimized for mobile devices.

questions.question: How can I contribute templates?
questions.answer: You can submit templates or request features by contacting our team via email or social channels.

questions.question: Can I get help with customization?
questions.answer: Yes, our team provides customization support for layouts, styling, and minor functionality tweaks.

questions.question: Is there production support?
questions.answer: Yes, we provide guidance for deployment, optimizations, and bug fixes for templates and components.

questions.question: How do I report issues?
questions.answer: Issues can be reported via GitHub, email, or our support portal. We respond as quickly as possible.

questions.question: Can I request new features?
questions.answer: Absolutely! We welcome feature requests and try to incorporate them into our future releases.
